name: Neopets: Petpet Adventures: The Wand of Wishing
name_original: Neopets: Petpet Adventures: The Wand of Wishing
description:
The Hidden World of Petpets Comes to Life!
All of Neopia is in peril. A villain driven by unspeakable powers has tracked down the fabled Wand of Wishing - an ancient faerie wand that has the power to grant its user any wish. The fate of Neopia is in your hands.
• Play as one of four Petpets in this adventure role-playing game.
• Save Petaria as you battle through a series of adventures leading to the secret of the fabled Wand of Wishing.
• Delve into Dark Caverns, Spooky Catacombs, Cloud Plains and other mystical realms.
• Have your Petpet compete with others in the Battledome.

One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
